Module com.example.timescheduler
Package com.example.timescheduler.view

Class RegistrationView

java.lang.Object
com.example.timescheduler.view.RegistrationView
public class RegistrationView extends Object
This class is the controller of the registration_view.fxml. It handles the user interactions with the registration window.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      This function initializes the two lists and binds certain properties of the GUI elements.

    • onSignUp

      protected void onSignUp(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This function is called when the sign up button is clicked. It checks if the user has entered their account data correctly.
      Parameters:
      event - Event that represents the action that the corresponding button has been pressed.

    • notifyOnCreateUser

      public int notifyOnCreateUser()

    • onCancel

      protected void onCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This function is called when the cancel button is pressed. It navigates the user back to the login window.
      Parameters:
      event - Event that represents the action that the corresponding button has been pressed.

    • onInfoToggle

      protected void onInfoToggle()
      This function is called when the info toggle button is pressed. It shows and hides information about the criteria for certain input fields.

    • onPasswordToggle

      protected void onPasswordToggle()
      This function is called when the password toggle button is pressed. It shows and hides the current value of the password field.

    • addListener

      public void addListener(RegistrationViewListener listener)
